meta_title: EOQ for MRO: Balancing Stockout Risks and Carrying Costs
meta_description: Most maintenance teams miscalculate EOQ by ignoring the true cost of stockouts. Here is the 2026 framework for optimizing MRO inventory and reducing SLOB.
title: Why EOQ is the Critical Metric for 2026 MRO Inventory Optimization

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Why EOQ is the Critical Metric for 2026 MRO Inventory Optimization

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic shot of a modern, highly organized industrial MRO warehouse in 2026. In the foreground, a diverse team of three maintenance professionals (two men, one woman) are standing near a high-tech shelving unit. They are wearing full PPE: clean high-visibility vests, white hard hats, and safety glasses. One person is holding a ruggedized handheld tablet (only the back of the device is visible). The warehouse features high ceilings, bright LED lighting, and neatly labeled bins with QR codes. In the background, a technician is operating a reach truck in a distant aisle. The atmosphere is professional, clean, and efficient, conveying a sense of advanced inventory control. No text or screens are visible.
